chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
si: sorted_interface
misi: max_index_sanity_interface
smsi: state_machine_safety_interface
lmi: log_matching_interface

Goal:
forall (l : list entry) (x : entry) (i : nat), i < eIndex x -> removeAfterIndex (x :: l) i = removeAfterIndex l i

Premises:
eIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (e : entry) => let (_, _, _, eIndex, _, _) := e in eIndex : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), entry -> logIndex Arguments eIndex {orig_base_params raft_params}
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
removeAfterIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix removeAfterIndex (entries : list entry) (i : logIndex) {struct entries} : list entry := match entries with | [] => [] | e :: es => if eIndex e <=? i then e :: es else removeAfterIndex es i end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex -> list entry Arguments removeAfterIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
contiguous_adjacent_sufficient : forall (x y : entry) (l : list entry) (i : nat), eIndex x = S (eIndex y) -> contiguous_range_exact_lo (y :: l) i -> contiguous_range_exact_lo (x :: y :: l) i
removeAfterIndex_app : forall (l : list entry) (i i' : nat), sorted l -> i' < i -> removeAfterIndex l i = filter (fun x : entry => eIndex x <=? i) (findGtIndex l i') ++ removeAfterIndex l i'
findGtIndex_removeAfterIndex_i_lt_i' : forall (l : list entry) (i i' : nat), sorted l -> i < i' -> filter (fun x : entry => (i <? eIndex x) && (eIndex x <=? i')) (findGtIndex l i) ++ removeAfterIndex l i = removeAfterIndex l i'
findGtIndex_removeAfterIndex_i'_le_i : forall (l : list entry) (i i' : nat), sorted l -> i' <= i -> filter (fun x : entry => (i <? eIndex x) && (eIndex x <=? i')) (findGtIndex l i) ++ removeAfterIndex l i = removeAfterIndex l i
removeAfterIndex_eq : forall (l : list entry) (i : nat), (forall e : entry, In e l -> eIndex e <= i) -> removeAfterIndex l i = l
removeAfterIndex_le : forall (xs : list entry) (i j : nat), i <= j -> removeAfterIndex xs i = removeAfterIndex (removeAfterIndex xs j) i
thing2 : forall (l l' : list entry) (i : nat), l <> [] -> Prefix l l' -> sorted l' -> contiguous_range_exact_lo l i -> contiguous_range_exact_lo l' 0 -> l ++ removeAfterIndex l' i = l'
findGtIndex_removeAfterIndex_commute : forall (l : list entry) (i i' : logIndex), sorted l -> removeAfterIndex (findGtIndex l i) i' = findGtIndex (removeAfterIndex l i') i
findAtIndex_index : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (e' : entry), findAtIndex l i = Some e' -> i = eIndex e'
findGtIndex_nil : forall (l : list entry) (i : nat), (forall e' : entry, In e' l -> eIndex e' <= i) -> findGtIndex l i = []
maxIndex_removeAfterIndex : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (e : entry), sorted l -> In e l -> eIndex e = i -> maxIndex (removeAfterIndex l i) = i
findAtIndex_elim : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (e : entry), findAtIndex l i = Some e -> i = eIndex e /\ In e l
removeAfterIndex_le_In : forall (xs : list entry) (i : nat) (x : entry), eIndex x <= i -> In x xs -> In x (removeAfterIndex xs i)
removeAfterIndex_In_le : forall (xs : list entry) (i : logIndex) (x : entry), sorted xs -> In x (removeAfterIndex xs i) -> eIndex x <= i
removeAfterIndex_same_sufficient : forall (x : nat) (l l' : list entry), sorted l -> sorted l' -> (forall e : entry, eIndex e <= x -> In e l -> In e l') -> (forall e : entry, eIndex e <= x -> In e l' -> In e l) -> removeAfterIndex l' x = removeAfterIndex l x
removeAfterIndex_2_eq_min : forall (xs : list entry) (i j : logIndex), removeAfterIndex (removeAfterIndex xs i) j = removeAfterIndex xs (Init.Nat.min i j)
removeAfterIndex_comm : forall (xs : list entry) (i j : logIndex), removeAfterIndex (removeAfterIndex xs i) j = removeAfterIndex (removeAfterIndex xs j) i
removeAfterIndex_same_sufficient' : forall (x : nat) (l l' : list entry), sorted l -> sorted l' -> contiguous_range_exact_lo l 0 -> (forall e : entry, In e l' -> 0 < eIndex e) -> x <= maxIndex l -> (forall e : entry, eIndex e <= x -> In e l -> In e l') -> removeAfterIndex l' x = removeAfterIndex l x
findAtIndex_in : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (e' : entry), findAtIndex l i = Some e' -> In e' l
contiguous_range_exact_lo = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (xs : list entry) (lo : nat) => (forall i : nat, lo < i <= maxIndex xs -> exists e : entry, eIndex e = i /\ In e xs) /\ (forall e : entry, In e xs -> lo < eIndex e) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> nat -> Prop Arguments contiguous_range_exact_lo {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope _%nat_scope
contiguous_singleton_sufficient : forall (x : entry) (n : nat), S n = eIndex x -> contiguous_range_exact_lo [x] n
findAtIndex_removeAfterIndex_agree : forall (xs : list entry) (i j : logIndex) (e e' : entry), NoDup (map eIndex xs) -> findAtIndex xs i = Some e -> findAtIndex (removeAfterIndex xs j) i = Some e' -> e = e'
findAtIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix findAtIndex (entries : list entry) (i : logIndex) {struct entries} : option entry := match entries with | [] => None | e :: es => if eIndex e =? i then Some e else if eIndex e <? i then None else findAtIndex es i end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex -> option entry Arguments findAtIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
findGtIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix findGtIndex (entries : list entry) (i : logIndex) {struct entries} : list entry := match entries with | [] => [] | e :: es => if i <? eIndex e then e :: findGtIndex es i else [] end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex -> list entry Arguments findGtIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
removeAfterIndex_in_app_l' : forall (l l' : list entry) (e : entry), (forall e' : entry, In e' l -> eIndex e' > eIndex e) -> In e l' -> removeAfterIndex (l ++ l') (eIndex e) = removeAfterIndex l' (eIndex e)
Inductive NoDup (A : Type) : list A -> Prop := NoDup_nil : NoDup [] | NoDup_cons : forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ In x l -> NoDup l -> NoDup (x :: l) Arguments NoDup [A]%type_scope _%list_scope Arguments NoDup_nil _%type_scope Arguments NoDup_cons [A]%type_scope _ [l]%list_scope
removeAfterIndex_in_app : forall (l l' : list entry) (e : entry), In e l -> removeAfterIndex (l ++ l') (eIndex e) = removeAfterIndex l (eIndex e) ++ l'
removeAfterIndex_maxIndex_sorted : forall l : list entry, sorted l -> l = removeAfterIndex l (maxIndex l)
entries_match_append : forall (xs ys es : list entry) (ple : entry) (pli : nat) (plt : term), sorted xs -> sorted ys -> sorted es -> entries_match xs ys -> (forall e1 e2 : entry, eIndex e1 = eIndex e2 -> eTerm e1 = eTerm e2 -> In e1 es -> In e2 ys -> (forall e3 : entry, eIndex e3 <= eIndex e1 -> In e3 es -> In e3 ys) /\ (pli <> 0 -> exists e4 : entry, eIndex e4 = pli /\ eTerm e4 = plt /\ In e4 ys)) -> (forall i : nat, pli < i <= maxIndex es -> exists e : entry, eIndex e = i /\ In e es) -> (forall e : entry, In e es -> pli < eIndex e) ->...-> entries_match (es ++ removeAfterIndex xs pli) ys
log_matching_hosts = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => (forall h h' : Net.name, entries_match (log (nwState net h)) (log (nwState net h'))) /\ (forall (h : Net.name) (i : nat), 1 <= i <= maxIndex (log (nwState net h)) -> exists e : entry, eIndex e = i /\ In e (log (nwState net h))) /\ (forall (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (nwState net h)) -> eIndex e > 0) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments log_matching_hosts {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
